meanings.definition: To depart from an established course or norm.
meanings.sent1: The car deviates from the road and goes into the grass.
meanings.sent2: Sometimes, a student deviates from the study plan and gets distracted.
meanings.sent3: The cat deviates from its usual nap spot and decides to sleep on the bookshelf instead.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts often deviate from reality and wander into the realm of fantasy.
meanings.sent5: The river deviates from its straight path, creating a beautiful meander.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that deviates from the norm.
meanings.sent1: She is considered a deviates in a group of conformists.
meanings.sent2: The artist's unique style makes him a deviates in the art world.
meanings.sent3: The purple cow was a deviates among the herd of white cows.
meanings.sent4: The black sheep of the family was always seen as a deviates.
meanings.sent5: The rare flower in the garden was a deviates compared to the common ones.
